content: [2025, Age 22] [TextBlock(text="AI's been my coding sidekick for a while now, but in Japan, I saw it not just as a tool, but as a collaborator. Code flows differently when you're looking at Mount Fuji, pondering the harmony between tech and nature. Back in NYC, the skyline's my new muse. Wondering how we can weave AI into the urban tapestry, making every line of code a thread in the city's fabric.", type='text')]
